# RelativeDateTimeFormatter.DateTimeStyle.numeric

**Case**

A style that uses a numeric style to describe relative dates, such as “1 day ago” or “in 3 weeks”.

## Declaration

```swift
case numeric
```

## Formatting Dates and Times

- **RelativeDateTimeFormatter.DateTimeStyle.named**: A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.

items.description: A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.
items.name: RelativeDateTimeFormatter.DateTimeStyle.named
